MemeDef.label: minotaur primacy
MemeDef.description: Minotaur have suffered enough under the hands of other xenos. It's time that the minotaurs take their revenge.

rulesStrings.li: memeAdjective->minotaur
memeAdjective->bovine
memeHyphenPrefix->bovine
memeConcept->the minotaur
memeLeaderNoun->minotaur
memeLeaderNoun->olympian
creation(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->We owe our prayers to [deity0_name], the first exalted minotaur brought into existence. Envious, mortal humans sealed [deity0_name] in an endless labyrinth.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->[deity0_name]'s long, mighty horns and herculean power intimidated the mortal humans, who sealed [deity0_name] in an endless, stony myre: the labyrinth.
intro(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->As [deity0_name], the exalted minotaur, stepped hoof onto land, rumors of [deity0_possessive] fury quaked through mortal humans' bones.
conflict(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Mortal minotaurs were drove into slavery and oppression by fleshbeasts- what we know today as "humans".

founderJoin(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->[deity0_name]'s believers had turned from few to many. And from many, to an army. Though many of their souls were felled by humans, their ancestors walk among us today as the gallant, fearless minotaur.

victory(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->[founderName] carries the blood of [deity0_name] and our ancient bovine martyrs, and vows to forever indulge [founder_possessive] minotaur in the finest frivolities: good food, good wine, and good lovin'.

setup(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->The minotaur have knuckled under the hands of fleshbeasts for too long, be it as their slaves, their guardians or their mindless, obedient cattle. [founderName] said "enough".

story(uses=1,tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Through migration, endurance and sheer will, [founderName] carried [founder_possessive] fellow minotaur to freedom. For each of [founder_possessive] kin that [founder_pronoun] lost on the way, a human must fall.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->We minotaur accept our fate as slaves for mankind- and to what end? I believe
lessonIntro(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->To those who look above for guidance, I ask you, do the gods cover their ears to our kind? Faith has failed us, but we will not fail us. I believe
lessonIntro(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Enough is enough. It is time for us to acknowledge
lesson(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->that the minotaur have countless generations of suffering to make mankind atone for
lesson(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->that a gluttony for power sheaths an underlying fear. Mankind's fear of the minotaur
lesson(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->that we must walk our own path in life
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Never shake hands with a fleshbeast without the other hand behind your back.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Glory to the minotaur!
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->We must live segregated from humanity, it is the only way.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->I do not wish to be equal with others. Nay. I wish for there to be no others.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->It's time for the minotaur to thrive.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Our time is now to choose: "fight" or "flight".

archistBasis(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->There's evidence to suggest that archotechnology was once hidden in the depths of the ancient, minotaur labyrinths of Noxia. Surely, they would entrust us with this for good reason.
archistFact(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->Only the minotaur have the "brawn" to match archotechnology's "brain".

archistProphecy(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->[inTheEnd], though we minotaur are but a vehicle for the archotech's amalgamation of universal sentience, we are the only ones who can protect it until that time comes.
animistFact(tag=meme_MinotaurPrimacy) ->The minotaur's connection with nature proves them as the sole candidate to nurture it. Other xenos only tarnish its splendor.
